column1: #Text=Library can be used to interface with datasets that were pre-processed with our pipeline
#Text=Currently we have exposed PyTorch and PyTorch Lightning API.
#Text=Please refer to the [**official documentation**](https://sc2-datasets.readthedocs.io/), or contact contributors directly for all of the details.
#Text=### SC2EGSet: StarCraft II Esport Game State Dataset

#Text=This project contains official API implementation for the [SC2EGSet: StarCraft II Esport Game State Dataset](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5503997), which is built based on [SC2ReSet: StarCraft II Esport Replaypack Set](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5575796).
#Text=Contents of this library provide PyTorch and PyTorch Lightning API for pre-processed StarCraft II dataset.
#Text=Manually install PyTorch with minimal version of ```^1.11.0+cu116```.
#Text=Basic example usage can be seen below.

#Text=
#Text=Use [SC2EGSet](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5503997) with PyTorch Lightning:
#Text=```python
#Text=from sc2_datasets.lightning.sc2_egset_datamodule import SC2EGSetDataModule
#Text=from sc2_datasets.available_replaypacks import EXAMPLE_SYNTHETIC_REPLAYPACKS
#Text=
#Text=if __name__ == __main__":
